h2_title: Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte
h3_title: Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Unfortunately, this isn’t even his only unpredictable leaping attack, as he can also just vault at you at top speed from a fair distance without a hint of preparation and cleave you with his sword for massive damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger's_Acolyte.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger's Acolyte', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte' and the sub-subsection 'Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, this isn’t even his only unpredictable leaping attack, as he can also just vault at you at top speed from a fair distance without a hint of preparation and cleave you with his sword for massive damage.
